LanguageData.ARR_ImbuedWeaponDamageDesc: The amount of damage this weapon deals when its wielder has flowing aether
LanguageData.ARR_ImbuedWeaponArmorPenetrationDesc: The amount of additional armor penetration this weapon gains when its wielder has flowing aether
LanguageData.ARR_ImbuedWeaponStoppingPowerDesc: The amount of stopping power this weapon has when its wielder has flowing aether
LanguageData.ARR_ImbuedWeaponRangeDesc: The range of this weapon when its wielder has flowing aether
LanguageData.ARR_TeleportFocusAttunementDesc: The aetherytes that this teleport focus's wearer is attuned to.
LanguageData.ARR_TeleportFocusRequiresAetherDesc: Whether this teleport focus requires a wearer who has flowing aether.
LanguageData.ARR_TeleportTeleportDesc: Teleport to an attuned aetheryte. (Right click to select target)
LanguageData.ARR_TeleportAttuneDesc: Attune this focus to an aetheryte.
LanguageData.ARR_TeleportBeaconAttuneAndSetHome: Attune to aetheryte and set as home
LanguageData.ARR_TeleportFocusDestinationError: Unable to teleport, could not find safe exit
LanguageData.ARR_TeleportFocusBeaconUnattuned: Cannot teleport to an unattuned aetheryte
LanguageData.ARR_TeleportFocusBeaconMissing: Must attune to an aetheryte before focus can be used
LanguageData.ARR_TeleportFocusAetherMissing: Current focus cannot be used unless wearer has flowing aether
LanguageData.ARR_TeleportFocusAnimaMissing: Cannot teleport while wearer has anima drain
LanguageData.ARR_TeleportFocusUncharged: Focus must be recharged before it can be used again
LanguageData.ARR_PotionBeltUseDesc: Use a potion carried in a potion belt.
LanguageData.ARR_PotionBeltCapacityDesc: The number of potions this container can hold.
